Text: Transfer Out Of EBSM McConnellMark It has been brought to my attention that you were successful in finding another opportunity at EnronCONGRATS In order to assist in updating the Enron Payroll System SAP please provide the following Effective Date Company Name Cost Center Supervisor HR Contact Should you have any additional questions or comments please give me a call or come by Thanks Raquel Guerrero EBS HR Coordinator Fax EBA
